Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[fn_GetDistributionCode]'') AND type in (N''FN'', N''IF'', N''TF'', N''FS'', N''FT'')) DROP FUNCTION [dbo].[fn_GetDistributionCode] ' exec (@vchSQL)
--************************************************** --fn_GetDistributionCode --************************************************** Set @vchSQL ='CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[fn_GetDistributionCode] ( -- Add the parameters for the function here @DistributionID int, @DistributionType varchar(50) ) RETURNS varchar(50) AS BEGIN
-- Add the T-SQL statements to compute the return value here declare @DistributionDesc varchar(50)
set @DistributionDesc = ( SELECT DistributionsDesc FROM dbo.vw_DimDistributions where DimDistributionsID=@DistributionID and DistributionsType=@DistributionType)
-- Return the result of the function RETURN @DistributionDesc
END ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
